segment.source: You should consider all of the different deployment configurations and prerequisites before you create your deployment plan.
segment.target: You should consider all of the different deployment configurations and prerequisites before you create your deployment plan.

segment.source: This section includes information that can help you gather the information that you must have to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.
segment.target: This section includes information that can help you gather the information that you must have to formulate a deployment plan that best meets your business requirements.

segment.source: Review the Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 software prerequisites and supported configurations
segment.target: Review the Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.0 software prerequisites and supported configurations

segment.source: After preparing your computing environment for DaRT 8.0 installation, make sure that you review the prerequisite software to install and the supported configurations to confirm that the selected computers for the installation meet the minimum hardware and operating system requirements.
segment.target: After preparing your computing environment for DaRT 8.0 installation, make sure that you review the prerequisite software to install and the supported configurations to confirm that the selected computers for the installation meet the minimum hardware and operating system requirements.

segment.source: For information about prerequisites that you need to consider to create the DaRT recovery image, see Planning to Create the DaRT 8.0 Recovery Image.
segment.target: For information about prerequisites that you need to consider to create the DaRT recovery image, see Planning to Create the DaRT 8.0 Recovery Image.

segment.source: Plan for creating the DaRT 8.0 recovery image
segment.target: Plan for creating the DaRT 8.0 recovery image

segment.source: Before you start to create the DaRT recovery image, you need to consider possible security issues, the tools that you want to include on the recovery image, and the prerequisite software that you need to install.
segment.target: Before you start to create the DaRT recovery image, you need to consider possible security issues, the tools that you want to include on the recovery image, and the prerequisite software that you need to install.

segment.source: Planning to Create the DaRT 8.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Planning to Create the DaRT 8.0 Recovery Image

segment.source: Plan how to save and deploy the DaRT recovery image
segment.target: Plan how to save and deploy the DaRT recovery image

segment.source: There are several methods that you can use to save and deploy the DaRT recovery image.
segment.target: There are several methods that you can use to save and deploy the DaRT recovery image.

segment.source: Before you start to create the recovery image, review the advantages and disadvantages of each method and consider how you want to use DaRT in your enterprise.
segment.target: Before you start to create the recovery image, review the advantages and disadvantages of each method and consider how you want to use DaRT in your enterprise.

segment.source: Planning How to Save and Deploy the DaRT 8.0 Recovery Image
segment.target: Planning How to Save and Deploy the DaRT 8.0 Recovery Image

segment.source: Other resources for planning to deploy DaRT 8.0
segment.target: Other resources for planning to deploy DaRT 8.0
